text: Tekkaman may refer to *Tekkaman: The Space Knight, a 26-episode anime produced by Tatsunoko Productions in 1975. *Tekkaman Blade, the 49-episode reboot of the original anime series, released in 1992. *Tekkaman Blade II, a 6-episode OVA based on the 1992 anime series, released in 1994. *Uchū no Kishi: Tekkaman Blade, a scrolling shooter game based on the 1992 anime series, released in 1993.
title: Tekkaman
